place_description: Welcome to Vavela Cafe! We are a Turkish style coffee shop located in Charlotte, NC. Our coffee is brewed using the traditional Turkish method, which results in a rich and flavorful cup of coffee. We only use the highest quality beans, and our coffee is always fresh and delicious.

reviews_data.review_text: Vibes.
Ayy, this place knows how turn it up at 1AM!!
Lovely coffee  place, great service, friendly atmosphere, and delicious food,  they have a variety of coffee flavors. Beautiful decor
Service was fast but one server smelled like alcohol. Food is mediocre. Coffee, Fruit cake and red velvet saved them from getting 1 star. Instagram hype.

edited: originally, I had a bad experience. I went there again since my family wanted. It seems the manager watched how/why I was frustrated. He kindly apologized and offered some treats. I am very impressed how he takes bad experiences seriously. That was good enough for me to change my review and I didn't expect food to be very good. Yet, it turned out to be their cakes are fresh and balanced tasted (not that sugary).
Excellent coffee but the music is so awful and way too loud. Imagine bad European club music.

Buzzing cafe with a great ambiance. Great location for a quick meeting. Only visited once during busy hours, but crowd thinned out after 3 PM. Service was amazing and the tea was soooo good. Will def be back. #freeparking

This place is gorgeous. The atmosphere is very welcoming , the service is amazing too. The owner even help my family and I find A table and is really personable. Although they serve a lot of people , it doesn't feel overwhelming and crowded. I definitely will be back
Coffee and food is delicious. The service is so fantastic everyone was so nice and accommodating. Cannot express how great this place is!
ASA!! Awesome awesome place for pastries coffee tea and conversation. Great staff and relaxing atmosphere. Located upstairs but there is an elevator available. Ample parking.

Beautiful place and great atmosphere. Amazing cuppa a coffee and delicious food. I can spend hours and hours thr. The place is so big and open. They have indoor and outdoor siting. I will definitely visit again
We tried pistachio latte and Dubai chocolate coffee. Just delicioussssss
Very nice and clean cafe a lot of desserts.
The absolute best avocado toast I have ever had in my entire life. Beautiful atmosphere. The staff is above and beyond amazing.
It's the ambiance for me. I come here to study. The Caramel Latte and desserts are a must!

I only gave 5 stars bc I couldn't give 10!  I love this place. The ambiance is great but I keep coming for the pastries! Amazing! Truly gifted bakers!!!! Ordering for dine-in can be a bit tricky since it's self seating so def get a copy of your receipt for referencing if you order a bunch of different things. Have fun!
Family, friendly, great atmosphere. Perfect place to break fast.

If I could give this place more than 5 stars .I would do it in a heartbeat. The atmosphere is nice, food is great .The service was 1000/10 even though the place was really crowded ,they made sure we were satisfied and found us a nice table. This place  is worth an hour drive. I will be back for sure.
Love this place! They have the best Dubai chocolate pie I have ever tried! 10/10 chicken pesto, Turkish coffee ! So delicious

It's a beautiful spot with pretty good desserts that aren't overly sweet (mixed berry tart is my favorite) and the drinks are also on the less-sweet side. It's a great place to enjoy with friends, but I wouldn't recommend it for a date since it tends to be quite crowded.

It was really great, beautiful, and so modern and authentic! The service was nice. The servers were very kind and knew exactly. Food was great. My daughter loved the Oreo cake and the lemon refresher.  The coffee and tea, and Karaka was great. The setting and place was super pretty. It was very modern and beautiful.  It was a amazing experience.
Great atmosphere, good service, pleasant people

My order was delicious. Loved the location. Free parking. Great service! However, dining in was weird. After placing my order, they gave me a table number & asked me to sit anywhere but every table was already occupied. They said I could share the table with anyone, and I found it weird being asked to go to a table to eat while there's someone there with company or with their laptops, textbooks, etc. I have not experienced this before, so I opted to take my food and go. Be aware of this. It will most likely not be a big deal to you, but I just wasn't comfortable sitting with a stranger like that.
Quick service and staff comes to check up on you. Only suggestion is to add more smaller tables and seating instead of the larger ones. Service, drinks,  and food were great!

It's a lovely spot with top notch ambiance and friendly atmosphere making it pleasant for a coffee or snack break. Kunafa was absolutely delicious with perfect amount of sweetness. The chicken pesto panini was fantastic and satisfying with the flavors balanced. The pickles provided along with the panini offered a crazy kick. Baklava Cheesecake was rich and creamy. Coming to Nutella kunafa, the combination didn't work for me. Definitely recommend it for a cozy hangout spot with friends!!!!
The Turkish dessert were divine and the vibes were there baby

Just got a decaf American coffee black.  It was perfect.  Not bitter or anything. Will be back with friends, and hope to find a seat :) Congrats on adding such a great space, and looking forward to using it often and trying lots of foods and hot drinks.

This location is beautiful!!! I have no words. It's clean and it smells like freshly brewed coffee. The tables are actually big and clean. It's an amazing study/work location. I ordered an iced caramel latte and Turkish desserts, the baklava one was delicious 10/10.
Very nice the Frappuccino was great and the cinnamon coffee cake was amazing
Coffee was quite good, in very interesting double layer cups.  The delights were tasty and chewy.  The oreo cake was ok.  The ambience is quite nice.

I love this cafe! The pistachio latte is so delicious. I come here almost every week and they never miss. There's always great energy, good service, and nice scenery. If you're in the University area and want good coffee and an even better vibe this is the place to go!

First visit.   They have only been opened one month but they have room for improvement:  1) it took over 20 minutes to receive two coffees and a dessert yet our sandwich only arrived after I questioned the over 30 minute wait time.  2) sandwich (pastrami and Swiss Panini) was made of quality  ingredients but it was not put together well:  not warmed completely throughout the panini and ingredients not evenly distributed. 3) I never observed a table being cleaned, wiped off nor sanitized.  Items were only bussed by the food runners when they would deliver your item. Food runners need help identifying the small order number signs.  The signs are so low the runners spend extra energy hunting the correct table to deliver to.  Very friendly, hard working staff but fine tuning desperately needed.
It's always crowded.. Very hard to get a table. But food is good. Desserts are good. Kunafa is best I ever had.
Yahyeh and Serena were absolutely and they were so amazing and friendly
Don't have customers wait past 20 min for a drink.
Super cool atmosphere... feels exotic.  Amazing coffees and desserts a MUST while in Charlotte.
The customer service is exceptional.

Mohammad and Yesenia were delightful. I was greeted from when I entered the building and they helped me decide on what to order. Wonderful vibe, food, service. I recommend to everybody. The cheesecakes are to die for and the refreshers!!!
My girlfriend & I went to IKEA in Concord. We wanted coffee afterward.  I found this establishment on Google maps. We loved the decore, friendly staff, baklava cheesecake, and coffee were great!
The service is amazing the food is also and the interior is beautiful
The best coffee place ever

Wow. Really nice chill coffee cafe. Turkish coffee house to drink different type of specialty coffee and tea.

They also have delicious pastries. The place is very comfortable and spacious. You can bring your laptop and work easily while sipping on some coffee.

Great place
This is best coffee place in town Ahmad and Moe are the best coffee makers Knafa is life

One of the best cafes in Charlotte! It's very cozy and super welcoming. I could stay there for the whole day. Their menu is hugeee it's hard to pick what you want. I recommend their waffles! Very tasty and high quality. Prices are affordable and worth it. Best part is that they close late!
Everting amazing thanks
New spot! Loved the vibe! The staff were friendly
Amazing ambience and amazing coffee. I loved the Karak Chai. Would definitely come here again!
We had our book club meeting at Vavela and I loved everything about it! My pistachio Frappuccino was delicious!
I've been here a couple of times and it does not disappoint!! The Dubai chocolate frappe is a must! The place is always very busy but they have great food items and coffee.

Love the ambiance of the place. A good place in Charlotte to hangout, meet up with friends or even get some work done. There's a lot of seating arrangements. Few good ones on the outside as well.
The drinks and food were disappointing. Kunafe was just so mediocre. But the price is expensive. Not happy with the food.
I love the smoothies here , the food is good and the staff is amazing.

Everything from the food to the customer service was AMAZING, they're always checking on you and making sure to smile. Also they have a variety of coffee flavors to choose from and their iced matcha is perfect, I've never had something like it. My friend had the Dubai Chocolate frappe and she loved it! They're also open late which is exactly what the students in the area look forward to
*"You have to try the kunafa and the pistachio latte--they're incredible! This is my daily go-to spot, and I think you'll love it."*

Amazing experience at VAVELA COFFEE The Turkish coffee was made with feeling, smooth, and perfectly brewed, with a deep aroma that lingered. Served traditionally with a side of Turkish delight, it was a treat for the senses. The service was warm and attentive, making the visit even more special. Highly recommend for coffee lovers!"

I ordered the kunafa and pistachio iced latte from Vavela Coffee Shop, and both were amazing! The kunafa was crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, and had just the right sweetness. The pistachio iced latte was rich, smooth, and full of flavor. The combination was perfect! Great food, great drinks, and friendly service. I'll definitely be back

Everything is amazing.. the vanilla Latte and the kunafa is the best ever.
Highly recommended I'll come everyday to get my coffee from here
Love it

Spectacular coffee shop. The ambiance is picturesque.
Some growing pains with the staff but I'm sure that will be ironed out soon

Coffee kinda sucked. Avocado toast was very disappointing, it was just guacamole on bread, i mean throw some mozzarella or vinegrette or something on there, why is there onion and tomato on it? Cheesecake was alright.
Out of the three Turkish places I visited in Charlotte, this is on top of my list. The place is so relaxing and welcoming, and the staff is very friendly. There is a variety of sweets and drinks.
Great vibes, good coffee. There were a lot of ppl on Sunday
Beautiful decor, good cake and sweets collection. It was packed when we went on the weekend but all very friendly.

Upon arrival, we were really impressed by the interior and how spacious the cafe was. But when we were ordering, the cashier was NOT helpful at all and we could barely hear her as she kept speaking very low. Then when we sat down, my coffee came out almost immediately, waited another 5-10 minutes for our food to come out (which was delicious), but my boyfriend's Turkish coffee was still not out. We waited 20-25 minutes for his coffee even after letting one of the servers know. The table next to us ordered AFTER we received our food and they still got their 2 TURKISH coffees and 2 sandwiches before my boyfriend's TUKISH coffee came out. Was very disappointed.

Best cafe in town!! You're met with a warm and refreshing ambiance that is exceeded only by the service and delicious coffee and treats!

Must try items:
- Pastrami Sandwich
- Pistachio Latte
- Karak Chai
- Turkish Delights
- Knafa

This place offers so much room and family friendly. Will be back!

The best cafe I ever been too and the atmosphere is very amazing and service is amazing and the people are amazing.
Ask for Bayan she is the best.
Absolutely stunning location - has got to be hands down the best vibe in Charlotte! Fantastic coffee, customer service, and overall atmosphere! Well worth the visit and will be coming back
I got the Lox bagel and the mango refresher it was amazing 10/10. Would get again. Highly recommend this place.
Great service. Great food!!
Super friendly staff. Amazing customer service always quick I recommend the banks strawberry Nutella waffles amazing will for sure come again
Amazing food and great service
I experienced such a warm and lively atmosphere..It was very crowded, and everything was amazing. I really loved the vibe. I'll definitely be coming back!
Best coffee shop ever and excellent service
Good vibes, I like the music and the interior design is good
LOVE THIS PLACE! it's really nice and they drinks are super good! Love bringing my friends here to hangout! Can't wait to come back
This place is so nice. The decor is beautiful. We each got small coffee's and the cups were still pretty large and filling. It's kid friendly and has a nice cozy vibe for hanging out.
Had so much fun here with friends. I enjoyed their refresher and Dubai Strawberry Chocolate. Amazing atmosphere and the workers are so sweet!
Hands down one of the best Knafeh I had in Charlotte. Very authentic coffee. The lighting and music is just right. I will definitely be back and highly recommend giving this cafe a visit.
Great atmosphere!
Very nice, relaxing

I finally checked out Vavela, a newish cafe in University City, and it was an absolute gem! The service was excellent--friendly and attentive from start to finish. I tried the Karak tea, which reminded me of chai but had a spicier kick, and it was fantastic. The food was equally impressive; their bakery and dessert selection is top-notch. I got the lox bagel, which was super delicious, and a key lime pie that was out of this world. The atmosphere was perfect--cozy, inviting, and just a great vibe all around. I'm already excited to come back soon! My only note is that they don't have a ton of outlet plugs for laptop users, but my laptop was fully charged, so it wasn't a problem this time. If you're looking for an amazing cafe experience, Vavela is the spot!
Was very busy on a Sunday. I really liked the atmosphere but was surprised that it took 20 minutes to order 2 lattes. The desserts and sandwiches looked delicious  but I did not order anything
100% recommended
Great place
Quick, delicious, and served in a clean environment. The atmosphere is warm, and the decor is thoughtfully designed. Definitely worth a try!
Everything is very clean and affordable. We liked the ambience as well. Definitely will come back!

Ordered Kunafa and Dubai chocolate frappe. Kunafa literally looks so good and it's crispy. ... There's like pistachios on top. They have like a special kind of a cheese as well. to make this. Okay, so cheesy. Haha. So if you like cheesy stuff, some of this sweet, this is definitely for you cause it's amazing and one of the best in town. I've tried Dubai chocolate frappe for the first time and it didn't disappoint.
Exactly what Charlotte needed!
Honestly great vibes mashallah, super friendly staff
Great service and atmosphere with even better food and drinks. The refreshers in particular were exceptional.

My husband and I have been to Vavela Cafe twice now, and both times have been such a wonderful experience! From the moment we walked in, the staff treated us like family--so friendly, attentive, and welcoming. It's rare to find such consistently amazing customer service, but at Vavela, it's clearly a priority. Each time we visited, they made sure we felt special, and the food was absolutely delicious. We can't wait to return! Highly recommend this cozy spot for anyone in Charlotte. 5 stars for the amazing food and exceptional service!
Amazing atmosphere, staff, coffee and food options!

Cool place with good coffee and good service. Beautiful decor. Could easily be 5 stars but the take a number and wait 15 minutes for cold espresso hurts the experience. They were very busy. Still espresso based drinks should be prepared as ordered and delivered within a few minutes not 15. That said the dessert was delicious and the server salvaged the experience by remaking a cold espresso shot freshly. The taste of their own roasted beans was solid as well. Really cool place.

Vavela Cafe is the perfect spot for a cozy and elegant coffee experience. Their Turkish coffee is rich and authentic, and the Karak Chai is a must-try! The menu offers a great selection of frappuccinos, pastries, paninis, and more, all made with high-quality ingredients.

The ambiance is beautiful and inviting, and the staff is incredibly friendly and attentive. Whether you're here to relax, study, or catch up with friends, Vavela Cafe is a must-visit! Can't wait to come back!
Great customer service, Coffee is delicious. Highly recommend
Fantastic atmosphere and a wonderful experience! The desserts and coffee are exceptional, and the staff is incredibly friendly. Highly recommended!

Atmosphere was nice
Coffee was very average
To me, it tased like Starbucks
You'd expect better from Turkish coffee
Cheesecake tasted like store bought from Publix
Berry torte was a OK
Overall, disappointed
It is sooo nice in Vavela! I had to cut my trip short and was sad I couldn't stay longer to study. Beautiful atmosphere, and the employees are super friendly!
The best coffee shop I've ever seen. Good customer service and great drinks I've ever tried. I highly recommend it!!!!!!!!!
The chocolate covered waffle and croissants were amazing. The coffee is good too. Their refreshers are really good and the customer service is too. A guy named Ahmad served me, he was very very nice.

Went here for coffee on a Sunday! It was way too crowded but the Vanilla Latte was amazing.
They also have lot of tasty bites available.
Looking forward to go there when it's not so busy because the ambience is very pretty.
Amazing customer service and best dessert. You should definitely come here whenever you have the time. I recommend the caprese royale sandwich

One of the best Cafes in Charlotte, especially the ambiance. Came with my friends, we loved the pistachio cream cake and kunafa.
They seem to be operating until 4am for the month of Ramadan.
Great coffee, great people!

I'm excited to have a new coffee spot in the area. The Cafe is very well decorated. I love it! It's very spacious but it was also crowded at the time I went.

They have many options from food to drinks I'm sure there is something there for everyone. I ordered the Limoncello Marscapone cake slice I wasn't really a fan of that. To drink I had the iced pistachio latte it was really good.

The service was nice the staff were helpful and made sure I got what I needed.

I'd love to go back and try some other menu items

TOO LOUD THERE 
May be service was good, food was good, sitting area was good but over loud music over shadowed everything.
Just keep it low enough that people don't have to yell to the person sitting right next to them and they can enjoy their time peacefully.

Vavela is an absolute gem! The food is rich and flavorful, crafted with care and authenticity. The cafe's aesthetic is a true homage to Turkey and very inviting, perfect for both quiet moments and lively conversation. The staff is incredibly kind and attentive. Best of all, the owner's hospitality is unmatched--welcoming, generous, and truly passionate about creating a great experience. A must-visit!
Amazing cafe! The owner and the staff are incredibly helpful and kind! So happy we have this close by!

Authentic Turkish atmosphere. The fact that the whole experience was considered thoughtfully became readily apparent during the visit. Great hospitality as well. I look forward to trying more items from the menu and connecting with friends here during the cafe's extended hours.
I love the food and coffee but take a really long time to bring you your order

This place was such a vibe. Owner and staff made us feel like family, gave me great suggestions for dessert (I got the kunafa), and the environment made me feel like I had just left America lol. Must see place in clt!
Loved it. You can tell the owner put their heart and soul into making this something special. We can't wait to come back!

A really loud, and boisterous atmosphere of a Middle Eastern coffee shop! Interior reminded me of a hookah lounge, but was clean and well stylized. The line can get a little long, and people tend to sit for hours and spend no money. Drink 1 coffee and take up a seat for an extended amount of time
NOT COOL CHARLOTTE!
We had about 4 16oz coffee, and 4 pastries.
Everything was really good, and standard prices for a coffee shop in CLT. Definitely would come here WAY MORE OFTEN if seating was more available.
I had the pistachio latte and zataar and cheese flatbread. Not only were they amazing with fresh made dough, but the place itself is so inviting. It reminds me of all my favorite places in Amman.
Great vibes, food, and coffee! The owners are so friendly and welcoming! Visited twice on the same day and will be back for sure! Thank you Khaled and Dina!

Had an awesome time at Vavela and will definitely be going back A LOT! Great coffee / food and very warm atmosphere. Made me feel at home :)
Thank you Khaled and Dina for being amazing hosts!!

I can't say enough good things about this coffee shop! From the moment you walk in, you're welcomed with warmth and a charming atmosphere that makes you want to stay for hours. The vibe is just perfect--cozy, stylish, and inviting.

The coffee is top-notch. Every sip is rich, smooth, and clearly crafted with care. The desserts and food are just as impressive and fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. I loved it so much that I came twice in the same day!

What truly sets this place apart is the owner classy, friendly, and genuinely passionate about creating a great experience for every guest. You feel like more than just a customer; you feel like a valued guest.

If you're looking for the perfect spot to relax, catch up with friends, or just enjoy an exceptional cup of coffee, this is the place. Can't wait to come back again!
Awesome staff! So kind and professional. They're accommodating and give great customer service. Such a fun atmosphere! Thank you Khaled

Tried this place for the first time today. We arrived at around 10 a.m. with the dining room about half full. We stood in line for a few minutes and ordered 2 coffees, 3 items from the pastry displays, and 2 items from the kitchen. We were told the items from the kitchen would take a bit and we were okay with that. The cashier never specified how long exactly, just that we would have to wait for them. It took over 40 minutes to get an iced americano (they initially brought out an hot americano so that had to be corrected) and a cappuccino. The server asked us if we were missing anything and we told him yes, all of our food. We proceeded to wait for another 20 minutes with nothing brought to our table. I asked someone, who I'm assuming is the manager or owner, if he could check on the food from the kitchen and maybe possibly get us the items that were already prepared from the pastry displays. He said he would check on everything, so we waited for another 10 minutes without anyone bringing any food to the table before just walking out. I've never experienced such terrible service at a coffee shop, especially considering most of the food we ordered was ready in the pastry display and just needed to be put on a plate and brought to the table. I witnessed other tables wait over 30-40 minutes for their coffee drinks as well and also heard other tables expressing their frustrations with the service too. I'm not sure if they were understaffed or not prepared for a full opening yet, or if it was both. But after this experience I'm not sure if it would be worth going back. I saw people waiting for take out coffees that also had to wait  30+ minutes, often having to ask about their drink orders. The way this business is currently being run definitely needs to be reevaluated and changed. The store was absolutely beautiful and had a great atmosphere, but a picturesque store doesn't make up for awful service (with high prices).

Guys... this place is INCREDIBLE! Came here with a friend for a study session and had the most pleasant interactions with the staff. I ordered a 16 oz Oreo Frappe (must try!) and friend ordered 12 Caramel Frappe. Both drinks were brought to the table in a timely manner and staff even cleaned off the table before we sat down. It was pretty busy when we dropped in but the atmosphere was so lively and welcoming, you wouldn't think twice. Halfway into my drink I realized they'd mistakenly brought me a 12 oz after comparing it to friend's drink and without hesitation the staff offered apologies and made light conversation, made me a brand new 16 oz drink, brought it back to the table and offered sample portions of house made desserts to me and my friend as an apology.  if you're in University City--scrap that, if you live in Charlotte, plan a trip here immediately.

This modern  restaurant is truly a gem! From the moment I walked in, I was welcomed with warmth and kindness. The food is absolutely delicious, and the service is beyond exceptional. A special shoutout to Khaled and Salma--two of the most wonderful, humble, and kind-hearted people I've ever met. Their hospitality made my experience even more special. Everything about this place is perfect, from the atmosphere to the flavors. I can't wait to come back

Should be called WOWELA instead! Our minds were blown. We casually visited to try the coffee out as we were fed up of the normal chains. Their pistachio latte, Frappuccino and the Arabian mint tea were the best. I am not going to talk about the Turkish delight sweets as this review wouldn't be enough. They also have paninis for a light snack. Beautiful ambience l, courteous staff and above all mind blowing coffee and tea.. we will keep visiting.

Best coffee, cakes and tea spot I have been to in Charlotte. Servers are super friendly and helpful. We went with our 3 kids and we loved the experience. Amazing flavor for the lattes. We will be coming back frequently.
Beautiful cafe! Everything was wonderful, even when it was very busy! I will be back

A fantastic place to hang out! We enjoy every minute we spend here. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, the place is spotless, and the food is absolutely delicious. A lot of parking spaces. Definitely my favorite cafe in Charlotte!
Great food and dessert .. and service. Loud music llhm zd wbrk
Great service and amazing drinks!
Amazing experience and service! Stop by for some Turkish coffee and a wide selection  of desserts!
me and my friends had a amazing experience the food is amazing and the place is such a cozy and relaxing vibe

I had a disappointing experience at this coffee shop. The table was not cleaned properly; instead of wiping it down thoroughly, the staff swept the crumbs onto the chairs and floor. Additionally, the coffee and food took much longer than expected to arrive. To make matters worse, our chairs were switched mid-visit because they needed them for another table, and the replacement chairs were quite uncomfortable. Overall, the service and cleanliness left a lot to be desired.
Delicious coffee and very tasty food. Service is friendly and attentive.

Was really excited to try this place, but after an hour, we weren't given the opportunity to try any of the food. 3 of the items we ordered were already made, and in the display cases, and after telling two different people that we were waiting on food from the case, nothing came. The prices are high as well, but that's somewhat to be expected with how opulent the decor is and how large the space itself is. The menu does have a lot to try, but again, after ordering and waiting an hour, we never got to try anything. The nail in the coffin for me was when we saw a couple come in (45mins after we had ordered) and watched them receive their coffee and pastries almost immediately. The surge of business is definitely something they were not prepared for. If you're wanting to give this place a try, I'd recommend waiting a few months until they figure out a better system. Really disappointing.
Good stuff I recommend

Had high hopes for this spot but it took them 35 minutes to bring out two coffees. We ordered a zatar cheese pie that took an hour and wasn't even remotely warm. Awful. The table next to us left after waiting for their pastries for over an hour. Management needs to figure out a system to bring food out faster and more efficiently.

The place is absolutely gorgeous and it's very clean and pure, when I first walked in I was in absolute awe. The workers are very kind and they always have a smile on their face and overall they are very polite and kind and respectful. The food is great too as well as their coffee, tea, frappes etc. overall the place is lovely!!!!! And so are the people!!!
As a Palestinian I can definitely approve their Knafeh. Nice place, good atmosphere and very friendly staff thank you.

I've just stopped by Vavela for the first time and I am the furthest thing from disappointed. The space is MASSIVE with tons of different seating. It's beautiful, and there's even a balcony with beautiful hanging egg chairs. I got their specialty Dubai Chocolate frappuccino, which was delicious and not outrageously expensive (definitely no worse than starbucks). I can't speak for the food on this go round because I can't really eat solids rn. The service was great. Everyone was very kind and attentive. I enjoyed not having to stand and wait for my drink. Since I was getting my drink "for here" they gave me a flag to put on my table to bring it out to me. It did take a little bit but they were pretty busy so I didn't mind. My TOP TIER number one biggest excitement about Vavela is the hours. They're open later than any cafe in the city by a mile, and very close to the university. If you're someone like me who likes to work in a place with some background noise (the music got a smidge loud at times but not unbearable) and works late into the night, this is THE place for you!
Amazing food, coffee, and vibes

I stumbled upon this place on my lunch break while visiting another establishment in the shopping center. I made a mental note to check it out next day and whew am I glad I did! Soon as you walk in the decor just greets you like a warm hug from a long lost auntie. It's absolutely beautiful and stunning! Some cozy and comforting.

I head to the cashier while having to pass by some yummy desserts and said to myself I'm definitely getting one of these! I order a chicken salad sandwich and a peach mango refresher and head to my table. Didn't take long for the food to arrive. The sandwich was served on a nice toasted bun and that peach refresher was singing in my mouth with its bubbly deliciousness.

After I ate my lunch I went back to order the caramel butter cake and a latte and I asked them to warm the cake up. Let me tell you, that cake was everything! Delicious, soft and moist. A worker stopped by my table to ask how I was enjoying everything and I said everything was amazing. He let me know they had only been open a week. Clearly word has already gotten out because the place was packed mid day. Perfect spot to go for lunch, or just to sit and unwind with a nice cup of coffee and a book or your laptop. Highly recommend this place and I will be back over and over again.

This place is a dream! Good food! Good drinks! I'm glad they start this business.
But the cashier, was very very rude actitud she looks like she's ready to go home. She needs to learn how to be nicer so it matches the vibe of the shop and also the names of the pastries.
Love that they close late! We need more late night spots!
The best Coffee Shop in the area, great food and cocktails! You guys should try the knafah too
Awesome new place
Nicest cafe in the area.... great study vibe or just hanging out and the dessert and paninis are to die for
Place looks beautiful, I will be very happy if you add crepes

everything about this place is a yes! it was super clean, staff was very nice and attentive. Its a beautiful mix of Arabian and middle eastern vibes and menu offerings. Portion sizes are a great size for the price also. I got the mixed berry tart for around $5-$6 and it was actually a pretty big size, and I got the pistachio latte which was amazing! Plenty of seating and seems to be a good spot for studying as well, since they had plenty of charger ports and etc.
What a great place. 10/10

Really good authentic Turkish coffee. I loved the biscuit - the fluffiest, tenderest biscuit I've ever had. Everyone working in there is so friendly. The decor is lovely. Do bring some time as food and drinks come out slowly, as they should to befit the vibe!
Beautifuuuuuuul atmosphere!!!! Very friendly staff.  Perfect for it all - catching up with friends and family or getting work done alone. Great dessert, even better coffee.

This is my spot now! I love their coffee especially when you get it with knafah  #1 knafah in charlotte,Great vibes, nice customer service.
Definitely recommended
Best of the best , unique design and great staff with excellent coffee and sweet , highly recommended
Excellent food and wonderful ambience! Coffee was very good. They have a large list of good desserts as well.
Great experience! Brewing coffee using traditional turkish method, the place is phenomenon you feel like you're in turkey

Vavela Cafe is an absolute gem! From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the cozy yet modern atmosphere--it's the perfect spot to relax or get some work done. The highlight of my visit was definitely the pistachio latte--hands down one of the best I've ever had! It was rich, creamy, and had just the right balance of nuttiness and sweetness. The staff was friendly and welcoming, making the experience even better. If you're looking for a great cafe with amazing drinks and a superb ambiance, Vavela is the place to be!
Excellent coffee food and dessert I go there almost everyday
This place was amazing! Service was great and fast, and such nice employees there. Food was amazing 100% recommend.
It is super brand, high class service modern coffee; very delicious food with an amazing comfort
This place is phenomenal. Everybody is very friendly, the coffee and deserts are great, and the atmosphere is wonderful.
The place is very nice and the coffee is very good and good service.

We had a amazing experience this Morning with an Excellent Environment, a lot of seating area ... beautiful inside and the food specially the sandwiches were good too. One good thing is that they have a little more in menu as compare to other halal cafes. Highly recomend!

vavela cafe is a great spot in charlotte for delicious turkish coffee. the coffee is rich and flavorful, brewed the traditional way. the atmosphere is cozy, and the staff is always friendly. whether you're in the mood for a coffee or just somewhere to study and have your daily drink while doing so, this is the perfect place to relax. highly recommend!
Amazing cafe!! Beautiful layout/decoration, great service, and good drinks/deserts. Must try!
Awesome environment and friendly staff. MashaAllah
What an amazing and beautiful place to enjoy some coffee and tea Turkish style. Charlotte community deserved this and you wouldn't be disappointed. Great food, amazing staff and perfect atmosphere
It's a nice atmosphere and will most likely be a hit during Ramadan. Also the staff are friendly and accommodating. 10/10

Great place to hangout and have some good coffee and good times. 

He places decor is amazing and you can definitely see the ffort that has been put into. 

Passes the vibe check 

Looking forward to visiting this place more often

Nice cozy atmosphere with dilecious desserts and coffees. They have turkish and non-turkish sweets. Multiple kind of coffees including Arabic Coffee which is a nice add to the place - In addition to Karak tea which is amazing.

Defenitly a 10/10
Really cool and well decorated new spot, owner was very kind and everyone seemed down to earth. The drinks were great and I'll definitely be back to try a pastry and some food!
Beautiful coffee place close to the university with competitive prices and very nice employees!
Best coffee ever!!!!!!! They have to grow their own coffee beans or something. So tasty and I can't wait to come back!
White Chocolate Mocha and Coffee cake was really good! Great environment for studying or chatting with friends
The atmosphere is fantastic!
Amazing food, service and vibes.  Love the sitting area and it's such a wonderful spot to study and relax in.
Comfy furniture and plenty of space to chat or study, great white mocha as well!

Vavela Cafe is a fantastic spot! The coffee is rich and flavorful, the food is fresh and delicious, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. The staff is super friendly and attentive, making every visit a great experience. Highly recommend!
Great coffe, great service, and over all great vibes, would highly recommend giving it a try
Absolutely amazing
I came here for a coffee and it was completely amazing, along with all of the people working inside. Great service would recommend as a daily coffee spot.
The atmosphere is absolutely gorgeous! Not only that, they have amazing coffee and desserts as well as great service! 10/10 would recommend
Best coffee! And very nice atmosphere
great atmosphere such a cool spot to go with friends or get some work done!! will definitely be making this a regular spot!! please try to chai karak if you're able to go it is so so so good!!
Loved! Best coffee I've had in a while!!

I recently visited Vavela Cafe and had an exceptional experience that I can't wait to share. The cafe offers a unique blend of Arabic and Turkish desserts that truly sets it apart. I tried their signature tea paired with a waffle, and both were absolutely delicious - the flavors were rich and comforting.

The cafe's decor is equally impressive, with a fancy yet welcoming atmosphere that makes you feel right at home. The location is perfect, offering stunning views that enhance the overall experience. It's an ideal spot not just for enjoying delectable treats, but also for studying or getting some work done. The ambiance is perfect for those looking to focus in a relaxed setting.

I will definitely be returning to Vavela Cafe many times, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a combination of great food, beautiful surroundings, and a conducive environment for work or relaxation.
This coffee shop offers a beautiful, cozy atmosphere with friendly service, delicious sandwiches, rich coffee, and creamy milkshakes--a perfect spot to relax and enjoy.
One of the best coffee shops I've ever been too. The inside is very beautiful and the food is amazing. Definitely recommended for anyone in the area!
This is definitely going to be my new go to place for coffee! Customer service is amazing!
Great place! Lovely atmosphere.
Best Arabic coffee in the Metro Area!!
Absolutely loved this coffee spot the vibe was cozy and the drink was top top notch
INCREDIBLE cafe. Friendly staff, and really great coffee. Will be visiting again!
atmosphere, food, vibes everything here is awesome
I really like it here. the food is good and the service is good. My only complaint was the fact that they cut onions and my eyes were on fire for half of my stay there while I was doing HW.
This place is absouletly amazing, from the food to the seating and the nice ambience. I enjoy the peaceful vibe overall. The food is to die for with good quality drinks. :)

This place is a gem! When you first walk in your eyes are automatically drawn to the beautiful chandeliers. To say this place is well designed would be an understatement. Everywhere you look, you discover something new.

Now, let's talk coffee. Pistachio latte was my choice.  I am very picky with the texture of milk in my lattes and Vavelas milk, wow. It was so incredibly creamy; I seriously couldn't stop drinking it. They had a wide variety of drinks to order. My friend got the Dubai Chocolate Frappuccino (which is one of their specials) and it was literally perfect. We also ordered a pastrami sandwich and a Nutella waffle. Let's just say we cleared the plate. The sauce on the sandwich is unlike anything I have tried before.

The staff was extremely attentive and friendly and gave good advice on what to order.

1,000% will be my go to spot from now on. Please do yourself a favor and check them out.
Great service and wonderful atmosphere

I recently visited Vavela Cafe and it's already a standout in the local coffee scene! The inviting aroma of fresh coffee and the warm, friendly staff made for a great first impression.

The ambiance is cozy yet modern--perfect for catching up with friends or getting some work done. Their signature dubia frap was smooth and expertly crafted, and the menu offers a great variety of coffee and treats. I also tried a flaky, buttery cheese cake that was absolutely delicious.

With top-quality coffee, tasty pastries, and excellent service, Valvela cafe is a must-visit. I'll definitely be back soon!

This place has an amazing location, great coffee, and incredibly friendly staff. I tried the Iced Caramel Latte and the Cheesecake--both were absolutely delicious! They just opened, and I highly recommend stopping by.
Good service and the employees are very attentive and friendly. I got the wild berry hibiscus refresher and it was amazing!! I will definitely be back!
Excellent Service, Staff and Tea!! They were very welcoming, the place is absolutely stunning and their Turkish coffee and tea were to die for! can't wait to be back!!
